titles: A briefe and learned treatise, conteining a true description of the Antichrist, who was foretold by the prophets and apostles And an evident proofe that the same agreeth vnto the Pope. Written in Latin by M. George Sohn Doctor of Diuinitie, and publike professor thereof at Heidelberg, and translated into english.
author: Sohn, Georg, 1152?-1589.
N. G., fl. 1592.
Grimald, Nicholas, 1519-1562, attributed name.
notes: N.G. has been misattributed to Nicholas Grimald.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Catholic Church --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
